articles.title: DBS to buy Citi's consumer banking business in Taiwan - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: DBS Group, Southeast Asia's largest bank, has agreed to buy Citigroup's consumer banking business in Taiwan via a transfer of assets and liabilities and will take over the 3,500 staff employed in the retail arm.

articles.title: Australia beat Thailand to set up quarter-final with South Korea at Women's Asian Cup - Reuters
articles.description: Australia defeated Thailand 2-1 at the Women's Asian Cup in Mumbai on Thursday to secure the top spot in Group B and set up a quarter-final clash with South Korea.
